summary: A college student creates a drug called "Z" and sells it on campus, inadvertently resurrecting the living dead, who wreak havoc at a Halloween rave.
cast: Aimee-Lynn Chadwick|Cory Hardrict|John Keefe|Jenny Mollen|Peter Coyote|Claudiu Bleont|Sorin Cocis|Cain Manoli|George Dumitrescu|Maria Dinulescu|Catalin Paraschiv|Radu Romaniuc|Sebastian Marina|Violeta Aldea|Ricky Dandel|Sandu Mihai Gruia|Aureliu Surulescu|Dan Bordeianu|Eduard Opaski|Diana Vladu|Maria Roman|Vlad Coada|Elena Ghenoiu|Ionut Grama|Mike Measimer
title: Return of the Living Dead: Rave to the Grave
